page.title: 16The Monocled Mutineer-1
page.content: During June 1985 BBC television have been shooting a film in Somerton _ The Monocled Mutineer which tells the story of a mutiny among British troops at a Tranisit Camp in France during the 1st World War because of harsh discipline before they were sent to the Front Line.Somerton was turned into Etaples, the French town.The Globe Inn was turned into a telegraph office and cafe.A false front was put across the road to form another cafe. The memorial soldier in the square was transformed into a Town Clock and the streets were covered with shavings and false cobbles. For more than a week extras dressed as peasants and British soldiers acted different scenes. Many spectators came to watch the filming in progress.
